Bash(git commit -m "Fix foreign key table references in models.py

Changed all ForeignKey references from ''se_competencies.id'' to ''competency.id'' 
to match actual table name from unified_models:
- CompetencyAssessmentResult.competency_id (line 155)
- LearningObjective.competency_id (line 210)
- LearningModule.competency_id (line 434)

This resolves SQLAlchemy join condition errors.")
